markdown:
<title level="1" right="Rules">[General Feat 8th](/Rules.aspx?ID=1480)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #169: Kindled Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=94) pg. 64</row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
At 8th level in a branch, your understanding of your branch's traditions improves your general capabilities, stretching beyond your studies in specific skills. You gain the general feat associated with the branch. If you already have that general feat, you gain a 1st-level general feat of your choice instead.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: General Feat 8th
search_markdown:
<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #169: Kindled Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=94) pg. 64</row>

Life in the Academy / Branch Benefits
</additional-info>
